page.title: 13FLOWERS IN TIBBERTON-EDGMOND
page.content: In this area you can find lots of Wild Flowers around the lanes and in the fields. In May the roadsides are a mass of{Cow Parsley.}Later{White {Campion}appears. {Rosebay Willow Herb}is common and can be found on moist, light soils and they have rosy clusters of flowers from July to August.{Elephant Hawk {Moth Caterpillars}are often found on them. Herbs can be found,{Comfrey Selfheal and{Mallow.}But they are not used for medicinal purposes now.{Elderflowers {and berries}are used for wine. Some rarer flowers can be found like the{Small Meadow Orchid,}in Autumn. Also, bushes of the{Lesser Common {Gelder Rose}as well as {Wild Rose }and {Honeysuckle. } {Poppies}are very common, they flower from July to September in rough grass.
